mapper.select: SELECT imdb_id , title , plot , type , rated , year , released_at , runtime , director , actor , award_win , award_nominate , award_major , award_major_type , imdb_rating , rating , review_cnt , likes_cnt FROM disney_contents WHERE imdb_id = #{contentId}

SELECT imdb_id , title , plot , type , rated , year , released_at , runtime , director , actor , award_win , award_nominate , award_major , award_major_type , imdb_rating , review_cnt , likes_cnt FROM disney_contents ORDER BY title DESC

SELECT A.imdb_id , A.title , A.plot , A.type , A.rated , A.year , A.released_at , A.runtime , A.director , A.actor , A.award_win , A.award_nominate , A.award_major , A.award_major_type , A.imdb_rating , A.review_cnt FROM disney_contents A
LIMIT #{criteria.pageStart}, 10
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.imdb_id) FROM disney_contents A LEFT OUTER JOIN disney_genre B ON A.imdb_id = B.imdb_id

where.if:
AND not EXISTS ( select C.imdb_id from (select distinct genre from disney_genre where genre in
#{selGenre} )D LEFT JOIN (select * from disney_genre where A.imdb_id = disney_genre.imdb_id) C ON D.genre = C.genre where C.genre is null)

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT type FROM disney_contents WHERE type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM disney_genre WHERE genre IS NOT NULL ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT rated FROM disney_contents WHERE rated IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rated ASC;

SELECT imdb_id , title , plot , type , rated , year , released_at , runtime , director , actor , award_win , award_nominate , award_major , award_major_type , imdb_rating , rating , review_cnt , likes_cnt FROM disney_contents WHERE imdb_id IN ( SELECT content_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY reg_date DESC );
